name: Fistful of Bullets -prototype
description:
something ive been messing with for a hot minute and ive been having trouble with making the game so ive decided to give people access to the project so i can get feedback and such.

its a retro western FPS inspired by spaghetti westerns and Western FPS (a western FPS made with RGM)

Current features:

-3 levels

-2 weapons (axe and revolver)

-2 enemies
